title: We Are Foaming Tigers: Microdosing and Eyeliner
itunes:title: We Are Foaming Tigers: Microdosing and Eyeliner
description:
This week, Ku is trying new ways to stay productive, the results of which might reveal themselves in this episode. More importantly, she’s back in the world with her people – friends and strangers alike and it feels too good (although it should be noted that Ku did test positive for a mild case of COVID ten days after we recorded this episode). Meanwhile, Su continues to find great makeup and channel her inner Euphoria look.

 

Please note, Add To Cart contains mature themes and may not be appropriate for all listeners. 

 

To see all products mentioned in this episode, head to @addtocartpod on Instagram. To purchase any of the products, see below. 

 

  • Honey is a great Chrome extension for internet discounts
  • Ku’s nails are press-ons from Olive and June
  • She keeps them looking good with their cactus cuticle serum, too 
  • SuChin found her perfect eyeliner from LA Girl
  • Kulap had an amazing bagel from Courage Bagels in LA

 

Stay up to date with us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram at @LemonadaMedia. 

 

Joining Lemonada Premium is a great way to support our show and get bonus content. Subscribe today at bit.ly/lemonadapremium. 

 

Click this link for a list of current sponsors and discount codes for this show and all Lemonada shows: lemonadamedia.com/sponsors

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
